description.value:
Scattering these icy ashes punishes the arrogance of those who act against you, displaying the frigid might of the Raven Queen.

Consumable: Rare

Power - Consumable (Standard Action)

Attack: Close burst 1 (enemies in the burst); the item's level + 3 vs. Will

Hit: The target takes ongoing 5 cold and necrotic damage, and cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points (save ends all). While subject to this effect, the target grants combat advantage to you. In addition, if the target makes an attack, it takes a -2 penalty to its next saving throw against this effect.

Level 15 or 20: Ongoing 10 cold and necrotic damage, and the saving throw penalty increases to -3.

Level 25 or 30: Ongoing 15 cold and necrotic damage, and the saving throw penalty increases to -4.
